definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: I let myself into my tiny little studio, all alone.
sentences.chinese: 我独自走进我的小斗室。

sentences.english: My room was so small that I felt fenced in.
sentences.chinese: 我的房间很小，使我有困居斗室之感。

sentences.english: I can give you your carbon footprint by cubicle, or by room.
sentences.chinese: 不管是斗室还是大屋，我都可以显示出你的碳脚印。

sentences.english: To do so, they must join a dozen other caged men in a communal area.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，他们必须与其他十多名笼民挤在一间斗室里。

sentences.english: Living in that small flat,she feels boxed in.
sentences.chinese: 她身居斗室，感到很闷气。

definition: the still of the night (idiom)/late at night
